## What makes Causalica different
::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
<div class="cardx">
  <h3>Design-first, not algorithm-first</h3>
  <p class="muted">
    Strong identification beats fancy models. I focus on assumptions, estimands, and robustness—
    then pick methods that match the decision.
  </p>
</div>
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
<div class="cardx">
  <h3>Reproducible by default</h3>
  <p class="muted">
    Clean structure, versioned outputs, and workflows you can run again. No “mystery notebooks”
    that can’t be reproduced a month later.
  </p>
</div>
:::
:::
